EmailTemplate.description: Case Created notification sent to External Customer
EmailTemplate.name: CH_Case Created Outbound All
EmailTemplate.subject: New Support Case {!Case.CaseNumber} created for {!Case.CH_Product_Name__c } with {!Case.CH_AccountNameforNotifications__c}; {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}, Thank you for contacting Nokia Support via {!Case.Origin}. We appreciate your continued business and the opportunity to assist you with your inquiry.
Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and is currently being directed to the appropriate Support Engineer. You will be contacted by an assigned Engineer regarding this {!Case.Type}.
Issue: {!Case.Subject}
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here: {!Case.Link}.
Regards, Nokia Support Services
